item.title: Sen. Lankford Warns Against US Arms in Venezuela
item.description: Sen. James Lankford, R-Okla., warned against using the U.S. military to force regime change in Venezuela, adding, "if you break it, you buy it."

item.title: Calif. Halts Medi-Cal Signups for Illegal Aliens in 2026
item.description: Illegal aliens in Democrat-led California no longer will be able to sign up for the state's Medicaid program once the new year arrives.
